00060    switch(IOType)
00061    {
00062       case IO_READ:
00063          CapLog("Start capture on %s: %d\n", pCapture->caps.driver, pCapture->fd);
00064          CapMessage("pData(%p), DataLength(%u)\n", pCapture->pBuffers[0].pData, pCapture->pBuffers[0].DataLength);
00065          while(!CaptureThreadStop)
00066          {
00067             ret = read( pCapture->fd, pCapture->pBuffers[0].pData, pCapture->pBuffers[0].DataLength );
00068             if(ret < 0)
00069             {
00070                switch(errno)
00071                {
00072                   case EWOULDBLOCK:
00073                      //CapError("EWOULDBLOCK...\n");
00074                      break;
00075                   case EIO:
00076                      /* Could ignore EIO, see spec. */
00077                      /* fall through */
00078                   default:
00079                      CapError("Failed to read from Capture Device - %d: %s\n",
00080                            errno, pCapture->caps.driver);
00081                      return 0;
00082                }
00083             }
00084             frame++;
00085             if ((pCapture->capture_count > 0) && (frame >= pCapture->capture_count))
00086             {
00087                CapMessage("Captured %d frames, stopping, as requested.\n", pCapture->capture_count);
00088                CaptureThreadStop = 1;
00089             }
00090          }
00091          break;
00092       case IO_MMAP:
00093          CapLog("Start capture on %s: %d\n", pCapture->caps.driver, pCapture->fd);
00094          CapMessage("pData(%p), DataLength(%u)\n", pCapture->pBuffers[0].pData, pCapture->pBuffers[0].DataLength);
00095 
00096          /* Initial queue of the buffers */
00097          for(i=0; i<pCapture->buffers; ++i)
00098          {
00099              memset( &buf, 0, sizeof(buf) );
00100              buf.type = V4L2_BUF_TYPE_VIDEO_CAPTURE;
00101              buf.memory = V4L2_MEMORY_MMAP;
00102              buf.index = i;
00103 
00104              CapError("Q buffer[%d]\n", buf.index);
00105              if((ret = ioctl(pCapture->fd, VIDIOC_QBUF, &buf)) < 0)
00106              {
00107                  CapError("VIDIOC_QBUF failed: %d\n", ret);
00108                  return 0;
00109              }
00110          }
00111 
00112          buf_type = V4L2_BUF_TYPE_VIDEO_CAPTURE;
00113              CapError("STREAMON\n");

00115          {
00116              CapError("VIDIOC_STREAMON failed: %d\n", ret);
00117              return 0;
00118          }
00119 
00120          openlog("CaptureApp", 0, LOG_LOCAL0);

00122          while(!CaptureThreadStop)
00123          {
00124             struct pollfd fd;
00125             fd.fd = pCapture->fd;
00126             fd.events = POLLIN|POLLPRI;
00127             fd.revents = 0;
00128 
00129             /* Wait for data, max 500ms */
00130             if(poll(&fd, 1, 500) > 0)
00131             {
00132                if( fd.revents & (POLLIN|POLLPRI) )
00133                {
00134                   memset( &buf, 0, sizeof(buf) );
00135                   buf.type = V4L2_BUF_TYPE_VIDEO_CAPTURE;
00136                   buf.memory = V4L2_MEMORY_MMAP;
00137 
00138                   /* dequeue frame */
00139                   if((ret = ioctl(pCapture->fd, VIDIOC_DQBUF, &buf)) < 0)
00140                   {
00141                      switch( errno )
00142                      {
00143                      case EAGAIN:
00144                         continue;
00145                      case EIO:
00146                      default:
00147                         CapError("Failed to dequeue buffer[%d]: %d\n", buf.index, ret);
00148                         return 0;
00149                      }
00150                   }
00151 
00152                   if(pCapture->timestamp)
00153                   {
00154                      static int prev = -1, this = -1;
00155                      static struct timeval tv_this = {0, 0}, tv_prev = {0, 0};
00156 
00157                      //CapError("DQ buffer[%d].seq(%d) ts(%d.%06d)\n",
00158                      //      buf.index, buf.sequence,
00159                      //      buf.timestamp.tv_sec, buf.timestamp.tv_usec);
00160                      this = buf.sequence;
00161                      tv_this.tv_sec = buf.timestamp.tv_sec;
00162                      tv_this.tv_usec = buf.timestamp.tv_usec;
00163 
00164                      if(prev != -1)
00165                      {
00166                         if(this != (prev+1))
00167                         {
00168                            CapError("DQ buffer[%d].seq(%d)(%d) mismatch\n", buf.index, this, prev);
00169                         }
00170                      }
00171                      prev = this;
00172 
00173                      if(tv_prev.tv_sec != 0 &&
00174                         tv_prev.tv_usec != 0)
00175                      {
00176                         signed int diff_s = tv_this.tv_sec - tv_prev.tv_sec;
00177                         signed int diff_us = tv_this.tv_usec - tv_prev.tv_usec;
00178                         if(diff_us < 0)
00179                         {
00180                            diff_s--;
00181                            diff_us += 1000000;
00182                         }
00183                         if(diff_s ||
00184                            (diff_us < 16600 || diff_us > 16700))
00185                         {
00186                            CapError("DQ buffer[%d].ts(%d.%06d)(%d.%06d) validity(%d.%06d) frame(%d)\n",
00187                                  buf.index, (int)tv_this.tv_sec, (int)tv_this.tv_usec,
00188                                  (int)tv_prev.tv_sec, (int)tv_prev.tv_usec,
00189                                  diff_s, diff_us, frame);
00190                         }
00191                      }
00192                      tv_prev.tv_sec = tv_this.tv_sec;
00193                      tv_prev.tv_usec = tv_this.tv_usec;
00194                   }
00195 
00196                   CapMessage("Dequeued buffer index: %d\n", buf.index);

00198                   if(buf.index >= pCapture->buffers ) {

00226              CapError("STREAMOFF\n");

00228          {
00229              CapError("VIDIOC_STREAMOFF failed: %d", ret);
00230          }
00231 
00232          /* Make sure every buffer is dequeued */
00233          for(i=0; i<pCapture->buffers; i++)

00239              CapError("DQ buffer[%d]\n", buf.index);

00241 
00242          break;
00243       case IO_USERPTR:
00244          CapLog("Start capture on %s: %d\n", pCapture->caps.driver, pCapture->fd);

int CreateCaptureThread ( psCapture  pCapture,
psCaptureThreadArgs  pCaptureThreadArgs 
)

Implementation of CreateCaptureThread. 

00409 {
00410    int ret = 0;
00411 
00412    if(pCaptureThreadArgs)
00413    {
00414       CapError("Capture Thread structure(%p) may be initialised, bailing out\n", pCaptureThreadArgs);
00415       return -1;
00416    }
00417 
00418    pCaptureThreadArgs = malloc(sizeof(sCaptureThreadArgs));
00419    if(pCaptureThreadArgs == 0)
00420       return -1;
00421 
00422    memset(pCaptureThreadArgs, 0, sizeof(sCaptureThreadArgs));
00423    pCaptureThreadArgs->pCapture = pCapture;
00424    ret = pthread_create(&pCapture->CaptureThread, NULL, CaptureThreadFunc, (void*)pCaptureThreadArgs);
00425    return 0;
00426 }
